div.span: Western Reserve Local Schools Counseling Services K-12 (during Coronavirus school closure)
BY APPOINTMENT ONLY- via ZOOM or Phone
Please email Mrs. Matos to schedule.
Mrs. Matos can be reached by email (dmatos@wrls.k12.oh.us) or by leaving a message at (330) 547-0818
in the event that you have questions, concerns, or would like to set up an individual ZOOM or Phone
Benefit Dinner To Support the Sunderman Family
Brian Sunderman passed away suddenly on December 1st. Brian and his wife Melissa and their children
all graduated from Western Reserve and have been life long residents of the reserve community. Lets
show our support to help them through this difficult time. Contact: Tina Vancise @ 330-398-1379

div.span: Western Reserve Schools are located in a rural community in northeast Ohio, in Mahoning County, about 20 miles west of Youngstown. The School district is located in two
townships, and houses approximately 850 students. The administration, teachers and staff attempt to offer a progressive, developmentally based curriculum for all grades.

span.span: The Western Reserve School District exhibits a great deal of pride from its history and long-standing traditions as it moves through the present and into the future.

div.style: position: absolute; left:651px; top:1002px; width:288px; height:10px;
div.span: The Western Reserve Local School District is aligned with the Mahoning
County Educational Service Center (MCESC) Business Advisory

span.span: The MCESC Business Advisory Council is focused on educating

div.span: Mahoning Valley students, parents and educators about the wide range
of career opportunities available, making connections with resources to

span.span: pursue a pathway and providing support to ensure success.

div.span: A well-prepared workforce that contributes to the economic development
and improved quality of life throughout the Mahoning Valley region.
To advise, support and empower Mahoning Valley educators in
delivering the instruction and experiences students need to develop
relevant, in-demand employment skills as part of their academic and
technical preparation for college, careers and/or military service.

img.alt: Kids Eat Free This Summer Click here for more information

Western Reserve Schools are located in a rural community in northeast Ohio, in Mahoning County, about 20 miles west of Youngstown. The School district is located in two townships, and houses approximately 850 students. The administration, teachers and staff attempt to offer a progressive, developmentally based curriculum for all grades. The Western Reserve School District exhibits a great deal of pride from its history and long-standing traditions as it moves through the present and into the future.

BY APPOINTMENT ONLY- via ZOOM or Phone

Benefit Dinner To Support the Sunderman Family
Brian Sunderman passed away suddenly on December 1st. Brian and his
wife Melissa and their children all graduated from Western Reserve and
have been life long residents of the reserve community. Lets show our
support to help them through this difficult time. Contact: Tina Vancise @
